channel.title: Help :)
channel.description:
ok when i do a popout they [b]never[/b] work out the way i want them too!
[img]http://i76.photobucket.com/albums/j27/fistfighta/lookcopy.jpg[/img]
they have a white background.....it was transparent but when i saved it, it became white again....
is there a certain way to save it or somthing?
help please ;) :D
[img]http://i76.photobucket.com/albums/j27/fistfighta/lookcopy.gif[/img]
z0mgsh ^^^^^^ got it working yay !!!!!
